1451850.name: Evil Manor Soundtrack
1451850.description:
Original 'Evil Manor' score by veteran composer Enrique Gómez-Cabrero. This DLC contains all creepy tracks from the 1st episode of Evil Manor.

Enrique Gómez-Cabrero is a very active film and video game composer, previously scoring music on the soundtracks for several award-winning short film and indie video games He also is well-known violin player and conductor.
